reference.title: Creating a client logs
reference.shortdesc: A client log interface refers to entries that are added to the central log from a SDK.

section.p: Entries can be added to the central log from a custom Couchbase SDK. These entries are typically responses to exceptions such as difficulty handling a server response. For example, the Web Console uses this functionality to log client error conditions.
To add entries, provide a REST request similar to the following:
section.codeblock: POST /logClientError Host: localhost:8091 Authorization: Basic xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Accept: application/json X-memcachekv-Store-Client-Specification-Version: 0.1
